resources.string: Dole ne a kunna izinin wuri
Dole ne ku karɓi izinin wuri don Securitly yayi aiki
Sannu, ni Emma, \u200b\u200bbaturi na ya mutu.
Securitly yana buƙatar sanin wurin ku koyaushe

Kuna son kunna wurin ku?
Je zuwa Saituna -> Apps -> Securitly -> Bada izini koyaushe.

Sannan sake kunna Securitly
Aika saƙon gaggawa lokacin da matakin baturi ya kasance
Shin kun tabbata kuna son sake saita tsoffin bayanai?
Da fatan za a gabatar da lamba
Kuna son share wannan lambar sadarwa daga lissafin lambobinku?
Da fatan za a cika filin "Sunan".
Da fatan za a cika filin "Lambar waya".
1. Securitly yana buƙatar sanin wurin ku koyaushe. Don yin hakan, je zuwa saitunan naurar ku -> apps -> Securitly -> Izini kuma canza izinin wurin zuwa "Ba da izinin kowane lokaci".
2.Kada ku tilasta rufe Securitly. In ba haka ba, ba za a aika saƙon gaggawar ku zuwa lambobin sadarwarku ba.
"3. Ba mu ba da shawarar ka saita matakin baturin da za ka aika saƙon gaggawa zuwa 1 ko 2% ba, saboda naurarka na iya kashe kafin aika saƙon."

"Dalibai 5 ne suka yi wannan app daga Cibiyar Fasaha ta Laguna, Mexico. Wannan aikin ya fara ne a matsayin raayin da muka tsara don tabbatar da gaskiya, kuma tare da jagoranmu, injiniya Gerardo, mun ba da damar. Tare da wannan app muna fatan ba da gudummawa kaɗan tare da halin da ake ciki yanzu a duniya."

"Wuri na ƙarshe na naurara shine:
latitude:
40.776570
tsawo: -73.969979
Gundumar Tarihi ta Tsakiya ta Yamma
New York, 10024, EE. UU."
Securitly ba zai iya aiki ba saboda "Aika SMS" ba a ba da izini ba
Securitly ba zai iya aiki saboda "Location Koyaushe" ba a ba da izini ba. Securitly yana buƙatar sanin wurin ku don ya iya aika sanannun wurin da kuka zaɓa zuwa lambobin da kuka zaɓa
"An sami kuskure samun wurin da aka tantance naurar"
Kar a nuna "wurin da ake buƙata" ya tashi lokacin da Securitly ya fara
